channel.title: Basic Coding Help
channel.description:
Hey guys, Thanks for viewing my thread. I'm not a very advanced coder. I can follow basic tutorials but thats about all. I'm lost on voids lol. I need help reducing lag on my server. I'm relocating training to edgevill and pking to varock wildy. I need help with the following things.
1.Relocating my training objects to edgevill 2.Relocating my shops to edgevill 3.Changing spawn point for when you die and when you first log in
NOTE: I can definatly change this stuff but just don't know what to search for in client or what ever and what java file i search for in
please don't flame my thread saying i'm a nub. I'm just like you used to be.
~dr4g0n sc1m

item.title: Basic Coding Help
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

1.Relocating my training objects to edgevill - newobjects method
2.Relocating my shops to edgevill - npcs in autospawn.cfg
3.Changing spawn point for when you die and when you first log in 1. applydead method, 2. player.java?

Read full topic

item.title: Basic Coding Help
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

kool server ip?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2007, 08:55:57 PM[/size][hr][quote author=playermanny2 link=topic=188281.msg1700010#msg1700010 date=1188027976]

i searched the id’s and it comes up with nothing about the coords only stuff like this

makeGlobalObject(3248, 3520, 2873, 0, 10);//atk[quote] thats a saradomin statue

ye thats it, makeGlobalObject(3248, 3520, 2873, 0, 10);//atk
^ ^ ^
xcoord ycoord obj id

ye thats it, makeGlobalObject(3248, 3520, 2873, 0, 10);//atk

3248= x coord

3520= y coord

Read full topic

item.title: Basic Coding Help
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

1.to relocate ur training objects, search for the object id in client.java, then change the x and y coord to the coords for edge
2. to relocate shops, go into shops file, then change x and y coord of the shop u want, to the coords u want

3 go into player.java and search this

// initial x and y coordinates of the player

find the x and y coords
it look like dis

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 3092;//3072; teleportToY = 3492;//3312;
change the “teleportToX” to wat u want
change the “teleportToY” to wat u want

and for wen u die i forgot lol…

Read full topic
